caption: The aerial image, sourced from GoogleEarth, showcases a residential area with a variety of features. In the center of the view, there is a large residence with a brown roof, surrounded by dense vegetation. Notable amenities include a kidney-shaped swimming pool, a brown tennis court towards the right. The area is well-maintained with landscaped paths and hedges.

objects.referring_sentence: The brown tennis court is located towards the right-hand side of the image.

qa_pairs.question: What is the shape of the main swimming pool?
How many tennis courts are visible?
